Text: I'd like some people to confirm this is not fake to not scare off people who think everything is a virus.

So far I think it's fake. It crashes immediately after you open it. But then again, all the files that would make up a normal game are there. so who knows. I'll comment again if I can get it to work. (Some INSTRUCTIONS would be nice...)
You need the dotnet 4 and xna 4 frameworks. This is supposed to be such an early version that it's not even worth looking at. You'd get more out of the youtube content.

BigD145 is correct, download those 2 n it will work, but it is a VERY early version. As the torrent says, PRE-alpha, this is the version before even alpha release. The version they are playing on youtube is late alpha/early beta.

Just download, unzip, and click on the Terraria application file. It has a xbox controller for a icon.
When ingame ESC opens Inv. Q throws items.
Space jumps. You can kill some motherfucking monsters and mine stuff, but it is lacking most of the items in the newest version.
It works!
Well, it does work, and like most other people have said, it sucks. Good if you want to try it out I guess.
Just a teaser so you get ready to buy (or torrent) the real game.

Just what i wanted before make my mind to buy, test the controls.
You sir, is a saver.
its only a tease but thank you!!

This is legitimate! nice work uploader, no idea how you got it, but its exactly as described just unzip it. its a very VERY early version but its a good way to get an idea of how it feels to play the final version!

I would like to confirm that this is the game, thank you for uploading it.

A few other things I would like to say it that there are caves.

They are DEEP underground though. (There will be a background of dirt and rocks.)

I was able to gather silver down there, and there is also red slimes.

http://screensnapr.com/v/eLyYtB.png
Me and my inventory.
Holy shit there are caves? I only explored the surface for caves before uploading but i will check now. I wish there was a way to save besides hiding in a dirt house.
so , how do I save the game ?

@Duhya2
You need to go very, very deep underground to get to them.

A few other things I want to mention is that there is (Of the ores I found)
Gold, Silver, Iron, and Copper.

And the monsters in the game are:
(All slimes) Green, Blue, Yellow, Red.

(I'm not trying to spoiler it for anyone I just don't want people to feel that there is no content to go searching for.)

I went deep and found some caves.
I noticed that you cannot build with wood, you can smelt without a furnace. When you die you lose everything thats not in one of your 10 hot keys.

Terraria will be released on May 16th (MONDAY!)

Warning to those who downloaded the 0770/0881 builds that has been around.

If you tried to run the 0.8.8.1 you now got a keylogger trojan/virus. Don't feel safe just because you have an antivirus because this one sails past several I tried with. NOD32 and Avast! didn't notice at all. Panda saw some activity but didn't block it.

Check your TEMP folder (easy way: start/run and type %temp% and it will open) for the file dclogs.sys wich will contain the stolen data. It will be created whenever you type in any program. If you open it in a texteditor you can see for yourself what it has collected.
